div.style: font-family: 'SFMono-Regular,Consolas,Liberation Mono,Menlo,monospace'; font-size: 14px; color: #f8f8f2; white-space: pre; line-height: 1.5;

foreignObject.div:
sainag@github:~$ help
AVAILABLE COMMANDS ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
help Show this help message about Learn about me skills View my technical skills projects Browse my projects experience See my work experience education View my educational background contact How to reach me clear Clear the terminal
──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Tip: Create an issue with a command name to run it!
